# Introduction

This package contains functions that I keep often in projects.

## Installation

`devtools::install_github("aelhabr/teproj")`.

## Notes

Here is a list of the noteworty functions in the package.

```{r }
library("teproj")
ls_vars_all <- ls("package:teproj")
ls_vars_io_start <- grep("^import|^export", ls_vars_all, value = TRUE)
ls_vars_io_main <- grep("ext$", ls_vars_io_start, value = TRUE)
ls_vars_other <- setdiff(ls_vars_all, ls_vars_io_start)
print(sort(c(ls_vars_io_main, ls_vars_other)))
?teproj::`teproj-package`
```

Here is the code coverage of the unit tests.
```{r }
covr::package_coverage()
```
